271.title: Modifies provisions relating to complaints filed with the Missouri Commission on Human Rights regarding discrimination based upon a person's sexual orientation or gender identity.
271.description: Modifies provisions relating to complaints filed with the Missouri Commission on Human Rights regarding discrimination based upon a person's sexual orientation or gender identity.

465.title: Prohibits medical providers from administering any medical or surgical treatment for the purpose of gender reassignment for anyone under the age of eighteen.
465.description: Prohibits medical providers from administering any medical or surgical treatment for the purpose of gender reassignment for anyone under the age of eighteen.

789.title: Adds that a person commits the offense of abuse or neglect of a child if such person assists, coerces, or provides for a child to undergo any surgical or hormonal treatment for the purpose of gender reassignment.
789.description: Adds that a person commits the offense of abuse or neglect of a child if such person assists, coerces, or provides for a child to undergo any surgical or hormonal treatment for the purpose of gender reassignment.

948.title: Establishes provisions relating to gender reassignment.
948.description: Establishes provisions relating to gender reassignment.

1987.last_action: Second Read and Referred S Seniors, Families and Children Committee
1987.title: Prohibits hormonal or surgical gender reassignment for a child under eighteen years of age
1987.description: Prohibits hormonal or surgical gender reassignment for a child under eighteen years of age

2084.last_action: Second Read and Referred S Small Business and Industry Committee
2084.title: Bars discrimination based on sexual orientation or gender identity
2084.description: Bars discrimination based on sexual orientation or gender identity
